text:
I'm giving a talk tomorrow at 6PM Mx City time on "Considering Julia" - it's in spanish though
<https://xalapacode.com/eventos/meetup-2021-03-12/>

attachments.title: "Considera Julia", 20 min Julia pitch in Spanish
attachments.text: Hello all! ¡Saludos banda! I will be giving a brief 20 min-ish talk tomorrow in Spanish called “Considering Julia”. It will be in Spanish, the link is here <https://xalapacode.com/eventos/meetup-2021-03-12/> And a google cal invite is here and I will be pre-recording a longer version (á la JuliaCon) so that I can talk about the things I want without feeling rushed :smiley: This was in part facilitated by @categulario (not yet here) and @xalapacode, a Mexican local coding org. I will post a li...
attachments.fallback: JuliaLang: "Considera Julia", 20 min Julia pitch in Spanish

<https://twitter.com/miguelraz_|@miguelraz_>: I'm giving a 20 minute-ish talk tomorrow on "Considering Julia" in Spanish, very much inspired by <https://twitter.com/jonhoo|@jonhoo> 's "Considering Rust".

Feel free further on to curious spanish speakers please! All are welcome <https://twitter.com/JuliaLanguage|@JuliaLanguage> <https://twitter.com/miguelraz_/status/1370167466358312960>
attachments.text:
I'm giving a 20 minute-ish talk tomorrow on "Considering Julia" in Spanish, very much inspired by <https://twitter.com/jonhoo|@jonhoo> 's "Considering Rust".

Feel free further on to curious spanish speakers please! All are welcome <https://twitter.com/JuliaLanguage|@JuliaLanguage> <https://twitter.com/miguelraz_/status/1370167466358312960>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/miguelraz_|@miguelraz_>: Gente bonita:

Mañana voy a dar una plática sobre "Considerando Julia", un crash-course en porqué Julia y es súper chido y por qué tal vez te conviene (o no).

Va a ser a las 6pm con <https://twitter.com/categulario|@categulario> y <https://twitter.com/xalapacode|@xalapacode>. ¡Todes bienvenides!
<https://twitter.com/JuliaLanguage|@JuliaLanguage>
